title: ST Makes Bullish Cross Above Critical Moving Average - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Sensata Technologies Holding PLC (Symbol: ST) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $46.80, changing hands as high as $47.32 per share. Sensata Technologies Holding PLC shares are currently trading up about 2.9% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of ST shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, ST's low point in its 52 week range is $40.78 per share, with $52.98 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $47.27.
